title: [WIP] Initial HIP-ification of PyTorch code for AMD hardware
body_html:
This is the upstreaming effort by AMD to integrate hip into PyTorch. These modifications will allow continuous modifications to PyTorch code such that it will run on AMD GPU's. For now, this PR contains code that only runs on NVIDIA. There should be no side effects, i.e. everything should run normally on NV hardware. Please check ... thanks.

@soumith

body:
This is the upstreaming effort by AMD to integrate hip into PyTorch. These modifications will allow continuous modifications to PyTorch code such that it will run on AMD GPU's. For now, this PR contains code that only runs on NVIDIA. There should be no side effects, i.e. everything should run normally on NV hardware. Please check ... thanks.
